Package com.gerard.site.dao.connection

package com.gerard.site.dao.connection
  • Class Summary
    Class
    Description
    AntiLeakingConnectionTimerTask
     
    ConnectionFactory
     
    ConnectionPool
    Final class that manages (gives out and gets back) specified fixed quantity of database connections which are instance of custom class ProxyConnection ProxyConnection .
    ConnectionProperties
     
    ProxyConnection
    Covers real database connection and works as proxy of interface Connection Connection, has it's own realization of method close() Connection.close() .
  • Exception Summary
    Exception
    Description
    ConnectionException
    Subclass of checked exception Exception, indicates some connection problems with database connection at the connection layer.
